name: Drive Car Parking Legend
description:
If you loves the parking games and 3D car simulations, then you will definitely enjoy playing this simulator game, this is Real life Car parking challenge for you. In Drive Car Parking Legend you can feel the realistic driving experience.

Features:
- 3D car parking simulator
- Realistic and easy controls: steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals
- Virtual parking lot environment
- Six stages increasingly difficult to test whether you are a stunt driver
- Easy to learn, hard to master
